The police need to find the anonymous tipster if they want to solve the crime ., 如果警察想破案的话 , 就要找到那个匿名的线人.

entry.tran: (专门提供赛马内幕消息的)情报贩子
entry.def: A tipster is someone who tells you, usually in exchange for money, which horses they think will win particular races, so that you can bet money on the horses.

means.word_mean: 1. one who sells advice about gambling or speculation (especially at the racetrack)

auth_sentence.content: But the tipster called back Tuesday morning to say deputies had the wrong house, Evans said.
